body:
### Describe the bug

I have a pure python script wherein I match a list and extract/create certain patterns out of it using either list comp OR for loop with numerous if/else statements within, for the various matching substrings. I've noticed cython takes forever (on my actual code it was still stuck at cythoning code.py to code.c after more than 12Hrs. I've created a min reproducible example to showcase the issue, with each additional line [after 20 statements inside the for loop] taking exponentially longer time to the point where it remains stuck on cythoning code.py to code.c :


### Code to reproduce the behaviour:

mycode.py
```
import re
class MatchPatterns():
    def myPatternsOne(self, patternsList):
        matched=[]
        for _ in range(len(patternsList)):
            try:
                matched.append(patternsList[_].split('|')[-1].split('/')[-1] + 'pattr1' if re.search('^SomeString.*EndIng$')\
                    else patternsList[_].split('|a')[-1].split('/a')[-1] + 'pattr2' if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                        else patternsList[_].split('|a')[-1].split('/a')[-1] + 'pattr2' if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                            else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                    else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                        else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                            else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                    else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                        else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                            else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                    else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                        else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                            else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                    else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                        else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                            else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                                # else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                                    # else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                                        # else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                                            # else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                                            #     else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                                            #         else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                                            #             else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                                            #                 else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                                            #                     else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                                            #                         else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1] if re.search('^SomeOtherString.?Number.*EndIng$')\
                                                                                                                                        else patternsList[_].split('|b')[-1].split('/b')[-1] + 'pattr2' + patternsList[_].split('/')[-1].split('//')[-1]  )
            except Exception as e:
                matched.append('Error at Indx:%s-%s' %(_, patternsList[_]))
```
To compile execute in cmd _**python setup.py build_ext --inplace**_, on a setup.py file with the following code:
```
try:
    from setuptools import setup
    from setuptools import Extension
except ImportError:
    from distutils.core import setup
    from distutils.extension import Extension
from Cython.Distutils import build_ext

ext_modules = [Extension("mycode",["mycode.py"]) ]
for e in ext_modules:
    e.cython_directives = {'language_level' : '3'}
setup(
    name= 'mycode',
    cmdclass = {'build_ext': build_ext},
    ext_modules = ext_modules)

```
Observe I've commented out some lines at the end in the mycode.py file -- I commented out line by line from the bottom [except the last line] to try and figure out at WHAT line does the code compile right away (as one would expect) - that is Line#27 (or 20th line inside the for loop), thereafter uncomment the next line and compile again and observe the times increase exponentially:
             min : sec
Line#27 -- 0:01 
Line#28 -- 0:08
Line#29 -- 0:19
Line#30 -- 0:33
Line#31 -- 1:07
Line#32 -- 2:25
Line#33 -- 5:06
Line#34 -- 9:15
Line#35 -- 19:46
Line#36 -- xxxx

### Expected behaviour

I expect cython to not take exponential time for list comps/for loops with if/else constructs. It does not make sense to me

### Environment

OS: [Windows 64bit]
Python version [3.10.8 but have also tested on 3.6 with same results]
Cython version [Cython.__version__ = '0.29.32']
I'm running a 7950x with 32GB DDR5 RAM so pretty sure its not related to low system resources (nothing else running and CPU at 1%)

### Additional context

_No response_

comment_data.body:
Have you considered writing this as a simple chain of:
```
if x:
      matched.append(f(x))
elif y:
      matched.append(f(y))
elif z:
      matched.append(f(z))
...
```
rather than this... rather impenetrable... chain of ternary statements?

I can reproduce this. Thanks for the report and the example.

I agree that there are better ways to spell this in readable (and fast) code, but this is a legitimate performance bug in Cython, introduced by an exponential recursion in `CondExprNode.coerce_to()` when nesting conditional expressions. This repeated recursion is unnecessary and can be fixed.

Profile of current master:
```
         27075799 function calls (25859190 primitive calls) in 14.751 seconds

   Ordered by: internal time

   ncalls  tottime  percall  cumtime  percall filename:lineno(function)
  1573029    3.033    0.000    9.821    0.000 ExprNodes.py:951(coerce_to)
524286/36    1.227    0.000   12.424    0.345 ExprNodes.py:12759(analyse_result_type)
1573036/1573020    1.155    0.000    1.706    0.000 PyrexTypes.py:303(same_as)
  3146995    1.019    0.000    1.688    0.000 PyrexTypes.py:108(is_fused)
  1573029    0.976    0.000    1.721    0.000 ExprNodes.py:1081(check_for_coercion_error)
  1572899    0.888    0.000    3.380    0.000 PyrexTypes.py:309(subtype_of)
524268/18    0.751    0.000   12.424    0.690 ExprNodes.py:12781(coerce_to)
3147455/3146995    0.669    0.000    0.669    0.000 PyrexTypes.py:82(get_fused_types)
  1572899    0.608    0.000    2.313    0.000 PyrexTypes.py:312(subtype_of_resolved_type)
  1573029    0.567    0.000    0.745    0.000 ExprNodes.py:126(find_coercion_error)
   524286    0.514    0.000    0.628    0.000 PyrexTypes.py:5016(independent_spanning_type)
  4194507    0.462    0.000    0.462    0.000 PyrexTypes.py:286(resolve)
  1572994    0.381    0.000    0.381    0.000 PyrexTypes.py:306(same_as_resolved_type)
```
Profile call count of a fixed version (where no `coerce_to()` calls show up near the top any more):
```
         2434764 function calls (2266654 primitive calls) in 2.262 seconds
```

milestone.description:
Goals:
– New version scheme: 3.x instead of 0.x.
– Change default `language_level` from `2` to `3str`.
– Change default for `binding` directive from `False` to `True`.
– Fix some Python compatibility issues (if possible, allowing for breaking changes).

title: [BUG] cythoning takes exponentially longer for list comps AND for loops with multiple if/else statements
